subtitle.line: Sleeping Beauty
Sleeping Beauty

line.words: Yon fwa, te genyen yon prensès ki te rete nan yon forè ki te gwosè Lafrans.

subtitle.line: Once upon a time, in a wood the size of France, there lived a princess.
Once upon a time, in a wood the size of France, there lived a princess.

line.words: Prensès la te rete nan yon chato ki te gen yon kloti ki antoure li. Kloti a te wo anpil.

subtitle.line: The princess lived in a castle surrounded by a hedge. The hedge was very tall.
The princess lived in a castle surrounded by a hedge. The hedge was very tall.

line.words: Prensès la te bèl anpil. Li te trè mechan tou. Li te rayi tou bagay. Li te menm rayi chokola, ak televizyon, ak bon sòsyè yo. Sa ki te pi mal, li te abitye di §Mwen pap janm marye. Pa menm ak yon prens.§

subtitle.line: The princess was very beautiful. She was also very wicked. She hated everything. She even hated chocolate, and television, and fairies. Worst of all, she used to say §I will never ever get married. Not even to a prince.§

The princess was very beautiful. She was also very wicked. She hated everything. She even hated chocolate, and television, and fairies. Worst of all, she used to say §I will never ever get married. Not even to a prince.§

line.words: Chak jou, ezateman a midi, prensès la te tonbe dòmi epi li reve de yon seri de move bagay.

subtitle.line: Every day, at exactly 12 o’clock, the princess would fall asleep and dream of wicked things.
Every day, at exactly 12 o’clock, the princess would fall asleep and dream of wicked things.

line.words: Yon jou prensès la te leve nan yon somèy pwofon. Li t ap joure tèt li. Li te soti deyò.

subtitle.line: One day the princess woke up from a deep sleep. Muttering not very nice things to herself, she went outside.
One day the princess woke up from a deep sleep. Muttering not very nice things to herself, she went outside.

line.words: Prensès la te jwenn yon ti baryè nan kloti a. Li sòti l al nan forè a.

subtitle.line: The princess found a little gate in the hedge. She went into the wood.
The princess found a little gate in the hedge. She went into the wood.

line.words: Prensès la te mache pandan lontan. Li te mache nan yon pati bwa ki te fè nwa.

subtitle.line: The princess walked for a long time. She walked into the dark part of wood.
The princess walked for a long time. She walked into the dark part of wood.

line.words: Lè sa, Princess la te tande yon bagay. Se te vwa yon bon sosyè a. Li te chita sou yon wòch. Li t’ap manje chokola epi li t ap gad televizyon. Bon sosyè a t’ap fredonen pou tèt pa l.

subtitle.line: Then the princess heard something. It was a fairy. It was sitting on a rock. It was eating chocolate and watching television. The fairy was humming to itself.
Then the princess heard something. It was a fairy. It was sitting on a rock. It was eating chocolate and watching television. The fairy was humming to itself.

line.words: Sa a te fè prensès la fache anpil. Li mare pwen li. Figi l te vini wouj. Li ranmase yon moso bwa. Li avanse dousman dèyè bon sosyè a.

subtitle.line: This made the princess very angry. She clenched her fists. Her face went red. She picked up a piece of wood. She crept towards the fairy.
This made the princess very angry. She clenched her fists. Her face went red. She picked up a piece of wood. She crept towards the fairy.

line.words: Men, bon sosyè a te konnen li te la wi. Li t ap tann moman sa a depi 100 an. Li te trè byen prepare.

subtitle.line: But the fairy knew she was there. It had been waiting 100 years for this moment. It was as ready as ready could be.
But the fairy knew she was there. It had been waiting 100 years for this moment. It was as ready as ready could be.

line.words: Bon sosyè a vole li desann wòch la. Li vole l al ateri bò bouch prensès la. Li bo prensès la sou pwent bouch li.

subtitle.line: The fairy jumped off the rock. It jumped as high as the princess’s lips. It gave the princess a kiss – right on the lips.
The fairy jumped off the rock. It jumped as high as the princess’s lips. It gave the princess a kiss – right on the lips.

line.words: E avèk bo sa a, gen twa bagay ki pase. Premye a, bon sosyè a tounen yon bèl prens.

subtitle.line: And with that kiss, three things happened. First, the fairy turned into a handsome prince.
And with that kiss, three things happened. First, the fairy turned into a handsome prince.

line.words: Lè sa a, prensès la te panse ak anpil bagay debyen - osijè prens la, osijè chokola, osijè televizyon, ak osijè bon sosyè a.

subtitle.line: Then, the princess thought very nice thoughts – about the prince, about chocolate, about television, and about fairies.
Then, the princess thought very nice thoughts – about the prince, about chocolate, about television, and about fairies.

line.words: Epi finalman, prensès la te rive marye ak prens la, epi yo viv ansanm pou toutan gen tan.

subtitle.line: And finally, the princess married the prince, and lived happily ever after.
And finally, the princess married the prince, and lived happily ever after.

line.words: Oh, epi li sispann dòmi nan egzakteman 12 è.

subtitle.line: Oh, and she stopped falling asleep at exactly 12 o’clock.
Oh, and she stopped falling asleep at exactly 12 o’clock.
